channel.title: work on Aimee's Note

item.title: Pace
item.description: Organizational Pace ‘Pace’ refers to the speed at which progress occurs and goals are met. At the organizational level, pace is strongly aligned with the management style of the core leadership team, particularly that of the CEO. It is possible to accelerate or decelerate that pace deliberately.

item.title: Github Migration Project
item.description: This project is to migrate all repos from GHES to GHEC. Project happened: FY23Q3, FY23Q4, FY24Q1, FY24Q2 GitHub official docs/tools: Get Repository Statistics GitHub Enterprise Importer CLI About GitHub Enterprise Importer
